title: Black Escort Agency: Nymphomaniac Aristocrats
overview: Alice and her friends are beautiful, affluent, married to important men; they have a well-organized and respectable life. However, they often awaken an irresistible desire within them to resort to the services of the famous Black Escort Agency, with its array of well-endowed handsome black gigolos. And when it comes to initiating a newcomer into their intimate circle, their immoral sexual games take an even more perverse turn.
